member.name: T:Test.FileInfo.SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES
member.summary: Structure used by windows to store security attributes

member.name: T:Test.FileInfo.FILETIME
member.summary: Structure used by windows to store file times. Referenced by WIN32_FIND_DATA structure

member.name: T:Test.FileInfo.WIN32_FIND_DATA
member.summary: Information about a remote file, returned by the FTPFindFirstFile and InternetFindNextFile API calls.

member.name: T:Test.FileInfo
member.summary: Encapsulates information about a file, on either a remote or local location.

member.name: M:Test.frmTest.FileManagement.FindFirstFile(System.String,Test.FileInfo.WIN32_FIND_DATA)
member.summary: FindFirstFile API. Necessary because system.io functions can't access shadow volume. http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa364418.aspx

member.name: M:Test.frmTest.FileManagement.FindNextFile(System.IntPtr,Test.FileInfo.WIN32_FIND_DATA)
member.summary: FindNextFile API. Necessary because system.io functions can't access shadow volume. http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa364428.aspx

member.name: M:Test.frmTest.FileManagement.FindClose(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: FindClose API. Necessary because system.io functions can't access shadow volume. http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa364413.aspx

member.name: M:Test.frmTest.FileManagement.CopyFile(System.String,System.String,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Copy File API. Necessary because system.io functions can't access shadow volume. http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa363851.aspx
